snippet.title: Castle Doombad - Nintendo Switch & Co-Op Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Castle Doombad is coming to Nintendo Switch with new 2-Player Co-Op! 🏰💀 Play the villain! 😈 Set your traps & defend your castle from heroes trying to rescue their princess & prince in this tower defense and trap-based puzzler! The upcoming new version of Castle Doombad is an expanded and remake with a new art style, new content, and new features -- coming to Steam (PC + Mac) and Nintendo Switch!

Wishlist the Steam version today: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2130010/Castle_Doombad/

More info on the official website: https://www.castledoombad.com

Join our discord!: https://discord.gg/Nw2pMsMUvz

Follow our socials for updates (and eventual release date): https://linktr.ee/grumpyface
